attributes.action: No more Double Yellow Disabled Badge parking in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Please sign this petition if you belief that no one should be aloud to park on double yellow lines including disabled badge holders, as it is granted e.g.  in Salford. Due to obstructing traffic or danger to road users those areas have been given the double yellow lines. Therefore it is important that no one ever parks on a double yellow lines, disabled badge holder or not. Please help to make that change in local law happening. Thank you
